titleStmt.title: Jojo's Bizzare Adventure: Steel Ball Run: Chapter 25
titleStmt.author: Hirohiko Araki

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Don't ever speak to me ever again-ever
cbml:panel.desc: Gyro Zeppeli is in the corner saying something

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: In 1191 A.D., 5 meters under the yard of Galstonbury Monastry, in Southwest Europe...
An 'Old Map' written on parchment was discovered.
cbml:panel.desc: Two archaeologists find a treasure chest.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: It was a relic of 'Joseph of Arimathea' In the chest is the 'Old Map.'
'Joseph of Arimathea' was the Saint, who, during the era of the Roman Empire.
Brought the dead body of Jesus Christ down from the cross after he was crucified on the hill of Golgotha..
..And who cleaned the body before its burial.
cbml:panel.desc: Jesus is taken off the cross by Joseph. Joseph and Jesus's mother, Mary, holds him. Mary give him a kiss on the head.

head.desc: Johnny and Gyro lay in the desert. A skeleton of a dinosaur is right behind them.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Joseph of Arimathea became a missionary and went on many journeys.
He founded the oldest Christian Monastery, Glastonbury, on the island of Britain, and died there.
cbml:panel.desc: Joesph looks out to the ocean.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: 'The Map of Joseph of Arimathea'...
cbml:panel.desc: A portrait of Joseph is seen. It overlaps in the first panel

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But nobody could understand the 'map'.
Nobody had ever seen shores with the 'shape' of those drawn on it.
A place that nobody hav ever seen...
A place that nobody knew...
cbml:panel.desc: Full view of the 'shape' Joseph drew

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: What was the purpose of 'Saint Joseph' drawing this map in the time of Jesus...?
Eventually, the 'map' began to fade from the people's minds...
cbml:panel.desc: Joseph stands in front of a picture frame. The picture is of a beautiful lady.
Closer view of the map Jospeh drew.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But suddenly...
1500 years later, in the 16th century, the 'map' was stolen and fell into unknown hands. It disappeared from the Land of Glastonbury.
cbml:panel.desc: A shady figure is walking away from the Monastery in Glastonbury..

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: It was a few years after the New World, 'America,' had been discovered.
cbml:panel.sound: stomp The comic uses the Kanji for stomp
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: And now, in 1890 25km to 'Monument Valley'
cbml:panel.desc: A view of Earth from Space
Gyro leads as Johnny rides close behind. A third person is slowly cathing up.
The feet of the three horses stomping quickly.
Johnny looks over the third person approaching. He wears a nervous and frusrated look.

cbml:balloon.said: Johnnyyy...
That guy's horse must be on steroids!
It's 25km to the goal! He either has some crazy technique, or He's just doping otherwise, he woudn't be able to challenge us at this point...
He must be doping! I just decided that he is. What was it? That guy's name behind us??

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro looks frusturated.

cbml:balloon.said: 'F.Y. Stroheim'!
He's German and he plaved 7th in the 1st stage! Let's let him pass us, Gyro!
Our horses' pulses have gone up to 220 per minute! If we force our horses to run at their top speed here, they won't las until the goal!

cbml:panel.desc: Stroheim has a monical. He looks with a neutral expression.

cbml:balloon.said: No, Johnny don't let him get close! We can't let any stranger near us!
The course to the left is my Valkyrie's favorite type of land! We'll let him crush himself there!

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro and Johnny start to go left while Stroheim follows.
Stroheim looks menacingly at them
Stroheim looks more menacingly as shadow cover his face. He holds out his arm that looks like a gun.
Johnny looks behind.

cbml:balloon.said: Gyro, He pulled out a gun!
He's a terrorist!

cbml:panel.desc: Strohiem points his gun at Gyro
Gyro flips himself around about to throw one of his balls.
Gyro gets shoot in the side of his stomach

cbml:balloon.said: GUH

cbml:panel.desc: Close up on Gyro's eye.
Gyro starts to fall off of his horse
Johnny looks in shock
Strohiem shoots more as Johnny tries to duck.
Gyro falls off his horse. He rolls a bit as the rest of them keep running.
Johnny falls off his horse.
Strohiem stands above Gyro and starts to shoot him.
The shots hit Gyro in the face.

cbml:balloon.said: Byoww!
It huuurrrrts!

cbml:panel.desc: Bullets start to enter Gyro's face
Close up of Strohiems eyes.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Y... You son of a bitch!
cbml:panel.desc: Gyro's face is filled with bullet holes. Blood starts to come out of his mouth.

cbml:balloon.said: Gaaah!
Freakin' hurts!

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro gets up and starts to rub his face.
Close up of Strohiem's face.
Johnny lays on the ground looking over at them.
Gyro starts to spin his steel balls.

cbml:balloon.said: 'The spin of the steel balls'...
It has the power to carve certain things and control certain body muscles.

cbml:panel.desc: Strohiem continues to point his gun at Gyro.

cbml:balloon.said: It looks like you can make your skin hard enough to bounce off bullets...

cbml:panel.desc: Strohiem starts to look nervous with this revolation.
The steel balls continue to spin. Gyro's wrist aborbed the bullets.
All of Gryo's arm has harded and absorbed the bullets.

cbml:balloon.said: You...
cbml:balloon.desc: Gryo looks mad. Blood continues come out of his mouth.

cbml:panel.desc: Strohiem starts to shoot again.

cbml:balloon.said: Waah! Fuck you!

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro puts his arms in front of him. The bullets bounce off them.

cbml:balloon.said: Drop them! Gryo Zeppeli!
Drop 'those' from you hand now!
If you don't, I'll shoot you friend and your horse.
You can even throw them towards me... It'll allow me to prove that my guns are faster...

cbml:panel.desc: Strohiem continues to point his gun at Gryo. But he pulls a second and points it at Johnny.
Gyro looks menacingly.

cbml:balloon.said: You want me to drop these steel balls?

cbml:panel.desc: Gryo gets up and spins the balls faster.
Johnny looks shocked.

cbml:balloon.said: Are you sure?

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro looks menacingly!
Strohiem looks nervous.

cbml:balloon.said: Well if you insist that I drop them...
I guess I'll go ahead and do that...

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro has a smug look on his face. The steel balls spin faster.
Strohiem looks nervous
Johnny looks confused.
The bullets are on the back of Gyro's hand. They start to spin too.
The bullets start to spin faster.
Strohiem's eyes full of fear.

cbml:balloon.said: Eh!
Dropped 'em

cbml:panel.desc: Gryo drops the steel balls as all of the bullets come back to Strohiem.
All of the bullets hit Strohiem. One hits his eye and another breaks his gun.
Strohiem's eye

cbml:balloon.said: Ugah!!

cbml:panel.desc: Strohiem flies back off his horse.
Strohiem falls to the ground
The steel balls land on the ground.
Gryo looks down at them.
The steel balls fly back up to Gyro's hands
Johnny looks shocked
Gyro gets back on his horse
Johnny looks frustrated
Johnny sweats. The panel is a close up of his eyes.

cbml:balloon.said: These terrorists...
Your home country... just what in the world...
What's going on?
Even if the victory of this continent-crossing race is a 'symbol of victory for a nation'...
It's too intense...! These assults from the terrorists...
Why do they constantly keep attacking you like that?
They're only after you!
But it's only a race! Before there was 'Oyecomova', and now 'Stroheim'! I feel something deeper... A 'deeper connection' between our country and the terrorists!

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny tooks frustrated!
Gyro looks down at Johnny.

cbml:balloon.said: I am a 'Servant of the King'.
If I am victorious in the steel ball run race...
The King will release an 'Amnesty'. That is all.
I will cross the continetn as number 1! If you think you're endangering yourself. You should travel separately.

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro looks down at Johnny. The shadow from his hat covers his eyes.
Gyro turns his horse and continues to move.
Johnny lays on the ground in shock
Johnny starts to get angry. He grabs his bag.
Something catches Johnny's eyes
There is cut on Johnny's palm
The cut goes all the way up to his thumb.

cbml:balloon.said: Ah...

cbml:panel.desc: The cut goes up the his thumb. A dark liquid comes out of it.

cbml:balloon.said: I cut myself... When I fell off the horse...
But I don't feel any pain...

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny rubs the cut.
The cur spreads out to each finger and down to his forearm. And a second hand comes out of the cut. It is made up of the dark substance.
Johnny's eyes widen

cbml:balloon.said: Wha?!

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny looks in horror as the third had wiggles around. More of the liquid starts to come out.
A beam shoots through the hand.
Close up of Johnny's eyes.
The new hole starts to bleed.

cbml:balloon.said: Wha...

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny sceams as the hand starts to go back into his skin.

cbml:balloon.said: What is this?! Gy...GYROO! WAIT! WAIT FOR ME!

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny holds his hand.
Gyro turns his head.

cbml:balloon.said: My left hand?! What the hell?!
L... Look! My hand just suddenly...?!?!

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny lifts his left hand to show Gyro.
Johnny looks at his hand as it glows
Gyro looks back at him.

cbml:balloon.said: What?

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny looks down at his hand.
Johnny inspects his hand.
Johnny's skeleton pushed against his skin.

cbml:balloon.said: UWAAH!
Th.. This... ?!

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny yells at his hand.

cbml:balloon.said: Hey, what's going on?
You yell at me... then ignore me and talk at the ground?

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro looks at Johnny
Johnny starts to sweat.

cbml:balloon.said: N... NO!
There's something! Something just... went into my hand!!
It came out of my left hand and went back in again!

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny pokes his hand. The skeleton has stopped pressing against the skin.

cbml:balloon.said: Did you hurt yourself somewhere?

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro starts to turn his horse around.

cbml:balloon.said: I don't feel any pain.. am I hallucinating?
But...that can't be... I feel it in my heart that it's not a 'hallucination' or a 'stand ability' or anything of the sort.

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny looks in horror and confustion at his hand.
Johnny's nails on his left hand start to spin.

cbml:balloon.said: My spinning nails are my 'stand ability'!
With my own will...! I can spin my own nails... my ability!
But this hand gives me a sense of something totally different...

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny looks at his spinning nails

cbml:balloon.said: There's something in there!
In my... 'left hand'... a,'left hand' that's not mine?! It;s been in there! Since when?

cbml:panel.desc: Johnny's left hand wiggles and shakes
Gyro looks back at Johnny.
A picture of the desert. There are fingers sticking out and in a circle.
A closer look at one of the fingers.
Mr. Steel sits in the train. He looks at the picture of the finger shaped rocks.

cbml:balloon.said: That photo was taken from approximately 200 meters in the air by a hot air ballon 3 while following the race.
The participants of the 2nd stage are mainly running on 2 routes
Approximately, 800 of the participants chose the route crossing the desert... However, 523 of them dropped ot at the place in that photograph.

cbml:panel.desc: The butler stands across the room from Mr. Steel

cbml:balloon.said: The main cause is thought to be accidents resulting from quicksand.
The death toll has risen to 68. This is a real dilemma.

cbml:panel.desc: Butler continues talk to Mr. Steel
Close up on Steven's eyes
Steven looks back down at the photo.

cbml:balloon.said: The local apache people call that plave the 'Devil's Palm'.
I say 'Area', but the ground changes and moves like quicksand nobody can predict where the 'Devil's Palm' will appear next.
The land shape had completely vanished within 6 to 7 hours.

cbml:panel.desc: Mountain view of the 'Devil's Palm'

cbml:balloon.said: Geologists believe that the area is related to an ancient meteor crash.
But its size and geological reason for why it moves around like living thing...
...Are things that nobody can explain.
The apache people believe that misery comes upon those who go near that land... And they say...

cbml:panel.desc: A whole view of the train carage.

cbml:balloon.said: The 'Devil's Palm' chooses the people...
Hm...

cbml:panel.desc: Closer view of the 'Devil's Palm.
Steven Steel's face
Steven Steel looks out the window.
The train goes through the desert. On the left of are the races.

cbml:balloon.said: Was 'Gyro Zeppeli' the first to pass through this land?
Yes.
Currently, the balloons have lost sight of him, but he is in first place accompanied by Johnny Joestar.
He is most likely 20 km from the goal, Monument Valley.

cbml:panel.desc: Steven continues to look out the window as his butler stands behind him.

cbml:balloon.said: After Gyro Zeppeli passed through the 'Devil's Palm'...
Was there any trace of him 'finding' something?
cbml:balloon.desc: Steven looks out the window more intensely.

cbml:balloon.said: Something... Mr. Steel?

cbml:panel.desc: Steven gets up from his seat
He walks to the other window.

cbml:balloon.said: A 'corpse' for example...
There is a possibility that Gyro Zeppeli found a human 'corpse' in that 'land'.
Look into it.

cbml:panel.desc: Steven has his hands together and is looking back over to his butler.
Butler stands where he is stunned.
Steven looks out of the window

cbml:balloon.said: E... Excuse me, could you repeat yourself?
Have the balloons catch up to him and investigate.
But it may only be part of the 'corpse' aucj as an 'arm' or a 'leg'
cbml:balloon.desc: Butler asks nervously as Steven continues to looks out the window.

cbml:balloon.said: This 'corpse' is supposedly 'mummified'
See if Gyro Zeppel is carrying it on him while racing.
He may be hiding it in a bag or somewhere on his horse.

cbml:panel.desc: Steven looks back at his butler.
Butler doesn't know what to say.

cbml:balloon.said: I'm just surprised at you suddenly mentioning this...
This 'corpse'
Mr. Steel outside of successfully completing this cross-continental competition...

cbml:panel.desc: Steven looks back out the window. Butler has his hand on his cheek.

cbml:balloon.said: Does this race have a different 'purpose'?
And this 'corpse'
Whose 'corpse' is it?

cbml:panel.desc: Butler starts to sweat.

cbml:balloon.said: I say this without a doubt! We shall make this 'Steel Ball Run' race successful!
But right now we need an investigation... An investigation of Gyro...

cbml:panel.desc: Steven looks back at his butler.
Butler bows

cbml:balloon.said: Yes, sir.

cbml:panel.desc: Butler leaves the room.
Steven pulls his chair closer to the window.
Over the shoulder view of the curtains behind Steven.
A match is light in the crack of the curtain.
The match lights a pipe

cbml:balloon.said: Your conversation Mr. Steel...
Allow me to make one correction...

cbml:panel.desc: Steven looks over his shoulder. There is a man in a pink suit and long blonde hair.
Steven's face
